title: Can't login into my PBE account
body: So for the past while I haven't been able to login into my PBE account. I have the summoner name Diana Bot on PBE and on the PBE discussion boards. I can't log into either of them. My login details haven't changed. I tried resetting/changing my password but that isn't working either. Whenever I try to login on PBE I just get an incorrect login message, same with the pbe.boards. Any help would be really appreciated. I don't want to lose my Diana Bot name on PBE.

replies.body: If you're getting the incorrect username/password issue it's likely that something might have been changed without you knowing. I'd recommend reaching out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to make sure that account is still safe and secure.
